member.remarks: ******************************************************************************************* DO NOT change any existing values, we are using string representations of these in tables where operation tracking is done, so need to be able to correctly parse values that were logged at any point. Adding new values is okay since it will not break Enum.Parse of the old values. *******************************************************************************************
